title: Invalid token when SAML users log in to the system
content:
When a SAML user tries to log in to the system, the following error message is displayed:

INVALID TOKEN
The request token is invalid. It may have already been used or has expired.

Cause

This issue can be caused by the time difference between the SAML IdP server and the suite environment.

Solution

To resolve the issue, make sure that the time on all hosts in the SMA suite cluster and your SAML IdP server is synchronized. Otherwise, users might fail to log in to the system.
